actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from May 24, until May 30, 1984, and of the Senate from May 24, 25, or 26 until May 31, 1984.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 24, until May 30, 1984, and for the Senate from May 24, 25, or 26, until May 31, 1984.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from May 24, until May 30, 1984, and of the Senate from May 24, 25, or 26 until May 31, 1984.
